EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_PivotalPracticesAppTx_WP_Q318.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Pivotal Practices: Application Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Pivotal Practices: Application Transformation white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
